Charged_Armor.help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a charged field that makes you highly resistant to Smashing, Lethal and Energy damage. Recharge: Fast
Charged_Armor.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to smashing, lethal and energy damage.

Lightning_Field.help: While active, you emit a storm of electricity that constantly damages all nearby foes. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Lightning_Field.targetHelp: You are taking damage from the Lightning Field.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
{PlayerSource} shocks you with his {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Conductive_Shield.help: When you toggle on this power, you are surrounded in a Conductive Shield that will conduct many sorts of energy away from your body. Conductive Shield grants high resistant to Fire, Cold, and Energy damage, as well as good resistance to Negative Energy damage. Recharge: Fast
Conductive_Shield.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has made you highly resistant to fire, cold, energy, and negative energy damage.

Static_Shield.help: You can create a field of Static Electricity around your body. This Static Shield protects you from Hold, Sleep, and Disorient effects as well as Endurance Drain, Recovery DeBuffs and enemy Teleportation. Static Shield can also help normalize your synaptic activity, granting you good resistance to Psionic Damage. Recharge: Fast
Static_Shield.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +Res(Hold, Sleep, Disorient, End Drain, Recovery DeBuff, Psionic, Teleport)
Static_Shield.attackerHit: You protect yourself from Hold, Sleep, Disorient, Endurance Drain, Recovery DeBuffs, Psionic Damage and enemy Teleportation with your {PowerName}.

Grounded.help: You are Grounded and naturally very resistant to Energy and Negative Energy damage. You also have added resistance to Endurance Drain effects. Additionally, Grounded provides Immobilize and Knockback protection, but only applies when you are near the ground. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.
Grounded.shortHelp: Auto: Self +Res (Energy, Negative, End Drain, Immobilize, KB)

Lightning_Reflexes.help: Your Lightning Reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.
Lightning_Reflexes.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

Conserve_Power.help: You can focus for a moment to Conserve your Endurance. After activating this power, you expend less Endurance on all other powers for a while. Recharge: Very Long

messages.attackerHit: Your concentrate and Conserve your Power. Your powers now cost less Endurance for a while.

Power_Sink.help: Power Sink leeches energy directly from the bodies of all nearby foes, draining their Endurance. Each foe you draw energy from increases your Endurance. If there are no foes within range, you will not gain any Endurance. Recharge: Long

Power_Surge.help: When you activate this power, you transform your body into living Electricity and become extremely resistant to all damage but Psionics, as well as Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Knockback, End Drain, Recovery DeBuff, and enemy Teleportation. Your Endurance recovery is also increased. As Power Surge wears off, the charge in your body explodes in a massive EMP pulse. However, expending all this energy will leave you exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long

messages.victimHit: Your {PowerName} power has left you exhausted.
